Text: Fantastic movie ... too bad there is no English subtitles.  maybe you know where to get them ?

I'm looking right now like the Devil to find the right ones; but the ones I've found so far out not in sync.

I THOUGHT that I had the right one and I adjusted the delay because of an opening studio logo, but the damn thing is off later on in the film!

If I find the right one, I'll post the link here; if someone else does first, PLEASE post it here!

Thanks!

FOUND IT!

http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/4866706/le-doulos-en

Getting the right frame rate was a B@stard  : )

Cheers!
